name: Dublin Marathon
description: One of Europe’s top marathons, attracting thousands of runners and spectators.

name: Haunted Dublin Walking Tours
description: Guided ghost tours through historic alleyways with chilling tales from Dublin’s past.

name: Candlelight Concerts
venue: Historic venues (e.g., St. Patrick’s Cathedral, Christ Church)
description: Classical and modern music concerts illuminated by candlelight.

name: Dtwo Thursdays Halloween Ball
description: Annual Halloween costume party with DJs and themed entertainment.

name: Guinness Storehouse Entry
description: Self-guided tour of Ireland’s iconic brewery, with tastings and exhibits.

name: National Museum of Ireland – Archaeology
description: Explore Irish history, including the Ardagh Chalice and Viking artefacts.

name: Trinity College & The Book of Kells
description: View Ireland’s greatest manuscript and the historic Long Room library.
price: Included with Dublin Pass or ticketed[1][3]

name: Grafton Quarter Shopping
description: High-end stores, Irish boutiques, and cafés in Dublin’s shopping district.
